title: Can't Log In
body:
(Note: Support ticket already submitted but was wondering if anyone had a quick fix)

So after playing a game earlier I got a message saying that I could not connect with League of Legends. After the client closed I attempted to log back in and got "An Unknown Error Has Occurred". Now when I try to log in it is stuck on the "Authenticating..." part right after I enter information. I tried a full repair through the client, disabling anti-virus, allowing through the firewall, and launching the legacy client.

replies.body: PLEASE HURRY RIOT! its happening to us all!! I'm getting the same message after league crashed after my first game of the day

Same.

Please, Riot. I like playing your video game, and I can't play your video game.
Same issue. I have AT&T Uverse. Did a full reinstall and used hextech repair tool but still nothing.
I have att uverse also
I wasn't able to see any issues with the servers overnight.  There may have been ISP problems, but hopefully everything is okay now!  Let me know if you're still having an issue.
can u help me fix this problem,i just spend the money on my lol account and I cannot login the new client and website,and cannot submit the ticket.plz fix this problem

Reach out to us directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can look into this individually with you.  The form doesn't require logging in, so you should be able to submit it without issue.  We'll get back to you asap!

I've done this, with even pasting this exact forum post in the form. All you guys did was send me a password reset link.

"We've received a password change request for your Riot Games account"

I literally said in the description this is NOT a password issue, if I intentionally enter an incorrect password, I get a different error, for incorrect credentials. Are you sure this is what you want us to do?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfOEfv4F,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2017-01-03T17:38:12.442+0000)
>
> I wasn't able to see any issues with the servers overnight.  There may have been ISP problems, but hopefully everything is okay now!  Let me know if you're still having an issue.

I have this problem still. It only affects one of my accounts for some reason.
I still cannot login in the new client,and the website with my another account

> [{quoted}](name=T1 Schen,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfOEfv4F,comment-id=000e00000001,timestamp=2017-01-04T01:03:44.911+0000)
>
> I still cannot login in the new client,and the website with my another account

When did this start happening to you? What does it say? Same thing happening to me
it is already two days,and when I login the new client,it said unable to connect ,and the website said an error occurred.....

> [{quoted}](name=T1 Schen,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfOEfv4F,comment-id=000e0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-04T05:28:06.958+0000)
>
> it is already two days,and when I login the new client,it said unable to connect ,and the website said an error occurred.....

I have the EXACT problem. Only 1 account is like that, right?
yes
IM HAVING THIS PROBLEM!! I can log into other accounts but not one specific one. Can't even log in on the league website
same as me ,I cannot login in my other account in new client,and also can not login into website.plz fix it

Happening to me as well. 
Time: ~6:30 CST
ISP: AT&T Uverse
Location: Louisiana (Could it possibly only be affecting a certain geographic location?)


****UPDATE****
It appears to be working as of 9:38 CST for me

Time: ~6:30 CST
ISP: AT&T Uverse
Location: North Carolina (Could it possibly only be affecting a certain geographic location?)
same area and internet, working now
Same boat but on Verizon Fios - no computers on my network are able to log in but my friend was able to log into my account on his network with no problem.
I am an idiot - no longer on Verizon FIOS but am on AT&T Uverse as well. Definitely must be a network based issue.
Seems to be a lot of us are ATT&T users myself included. I am still having the issues. Really sucks because I was almost done with my flex queue placements haha

I have AT&T and the same problem :/
I'm guessing it's on their end.
I'm in the same boat...
Glad to see it's not just me!
Same..

I have submitted a ticket - 

meanwhile, everyone else on the thread, if you get any updates or news from rioters, please let us know. I'd like to fix this problem ASAP.

> [{quoted}](name=oBlueAura,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gfOEfv4F,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-01-04T23:35:33.883+0000)
>
> I have submitted a ticket - 
> 
> meanwhile, everyone else on the thread, if you get any updates or news from rioters, please let us know. I'd like to fix this problem ASAP.

Mine fixed by itself and everything is fine now. 
Use legacy client if you want to be able to play. 
I guess it'll fix itself eventually.
Targons Blade , please check this thread out

I'm having a "An error has occured" when I try to log into the website and "Can not connect to login queue" on the new client.

I am able to log into other accounts and also able to log in VIA legacy client only.
Has anyone taken any action to fix this? Or am I just waiting until it works again?
ATT here as well, cannot log in. Got the exact same error as OP, suddenly disconnected and cannot log in as of 6pm or so last night. Still cant log in as of this morning. PLS RITO
Just letting you all know, I've been trying periodically to log in and just logged in successfully! Hopefully it will be the same for everyone. Best of luck in your games!
Just to confirm, you didnt do anything right?
I can confirm, it is working. Try it out fam.
I was just able to log in as well. (of course it happens to start working when I have to go to bed)
also using at&t here. wow. wonder if thats relevant?
Same thing using att, also I can play other games so it is just league that is messing up.
I cant log in either, hopefully they will fix it soon.
